```{r}
ggplot(data = arrancoordinates) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = longitude, y = latitude)) +
  ggtitle("Arran Postcodes") +
  labs(title = "Arran Postcodes", x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```
